Plot: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.
Title: Surf's Up
Writer: Don Rhymer (screenplay), Ash Brannon (screenplay), Chris Buck (screenplay), Christopher Jenkins (screenplay), Christopher Jenkins (story by), Christian Darren (story by)
Actors: Shia LaBeouf, Jeff Bridges, Zooey Deschanel, Jon Heder
tomatoConsensus: Surf's Up is a laid back, visually stunning animated movie that brings a fresh twist to some familiar conventions. Its witty mockumentary format is fun and inventive, and the CGI is breathtakingly realistic.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 18 nominations.
